title: SkillSetRequestPayload (SSR_Payload)
description: Schema for the payload of a Skill Set Request (SSR) message in ACNBP. Sent by a_req to a_prov_candidate. This payload is digitally signed.

messageId.description: Unique identifier for this SSR message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the SSR was created.

requesterAgentId.description: The ANS name or unique ID of the Requester Agent (a_req).

candidateProviderAgentAnsName.description: The ANS Name of the Candidate Provider Agent (a_prov_candidate) this request is for.

requesterProtocolExtension.description: The requester's complete ProtocolExtension (pe_req), detailing its own capabilities, supported protocols, security profile, etc.

responseDeadline.description: Optional: Requested deadline for the provider to respond with an SSO.
